title: Phulkari
description: solid 1 3/4\" squares with silk leaf embroidery on rust wool (?) woven cloth; vertical sides have borders with leaves and flowers; embroidery is satin stitch in gold, yellow, with random purple, cerise and olive green; three panels hand stitched together
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
